comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
Looks like an early machine for the transmission of photographs over via radio wave  transmission.  I recently saw a similar machine (not by Bermocchi) in the Powerhouse Museum, Sydney, Australia.

I can't find any online references to Bermocchi at the moment.

comment.author: 27814716@N06
comment._content: For some notes/links on the machine see second photo of it at www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2764623503/
